mapper.insert: insert into user(name, password, dob, description, longitude, latitude) values (#{name}, #{password}, #{dob}, #{description}, #{longitude}, #{latitude})
mapper.select: select *, date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime, date_format(update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as updateTime from user where name = #{name} and password = #{password}
